name: FightForce
description:
Welcome to FightForce, a two-player local co-op fast-paced fighting game with infinite replayability! Grab a friend and try three different, unique characters each with their own special abilities. Developed with multiplayer fun in mind, FightForce boasts a creative map with high verticality and interesting objects to spruce things up. If you want a simple, entertaining fighting game with short and sweet rounds, this is the game for you!

MEET THE FIGHERS

Gunner: As a retired U.S. soldier with extensive military training, the Gunner has high proficiency with his gun and makes up for its low lethality with very high firerate.  At max charge, he can use full focus and increase his rate of fire to levels unmatched by any other fighter.

Wizard: An old man with an expertise in magic and an aversion towards shaving, the Wizard boasts a combination of damage and firerate as well as a magic staff with cool sound effects. At max charge, he unleases a huge blast of sorcery sure to knock off a majority of his opponents' health pool.

Ghost: Although his origins are unknown, his skillset is anything but ambiguous. A high-risk, high-reward character, the Ghost puts all his power into his slow but deadly projectiles which do extreme damage. At max charge, the Ghost can change his state of being, and avoid taking damage from all projectiles.

PLAYER 1 CONTROLS

MOVEMENT: WASD

PRIMARY FIRE: R

ULTIMATE: SHIFT

PLAYER 2 CONTROLS

MOVEMENT: ARROW KEYS

PRIMARY FIRE: PERIOD

ULTIMATE: COMMA

WHILE INGAME

BACK TO MENU: O

RESTART ROUND: P

***FightForce is made by high school students and is still in development. If you have any opinions or feedback regarding the game, please leave a review!
